installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [[ -z ${VERSION} ]]; then
	echo -e \"Please set the VERSION variable (e.g. v3.0.0)\"
	exit 0
fi

if [ \"$(ls -A /mnt/server)\" ]; then
	echo \"Upating...\"
	git fetch --all --tags
	git checkout tags/${VERSION}
else
	echo -e \"Cloning...\"
	git clone https://github.com/discord-tickets/bot.git .
fi

echo \"Installing plugins\"
if [[ ! -z ${PUGINS} ]]; then
	/usr/local/bin/npm install ${PUGINS}
fi

echo \"Installing common dependencies\"
if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
	/usr/local/bin/npm install --production
fi

echo -e \"Installed\"
exit 0
